=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 13, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 13, col = 1)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed (staying at row 13, col 1), I need to analyze the current state further to determine the best course of action.

The avatar is currently at (row 13, col 1), which is an empty space (denoted by '.'). To the left (col 0) is a wall ('&'), and to the right (col 2) is also a floor ('.'). Moving up (row 12) or down (row 14) would also keep the avatar on empty floors.

The main goal is to collect goodies while avoiding monsters. Noticing that the nearest collectibles are at (row 1, col 1) and (row 1, col 15 - 26) as well as (row 2, col 1 - 26), it would be strategic to start moving in a direction that could lead me toward those goodies without moving towards monsters that might pose a threat, particularly since I also have to be cautious about positioning relative to the entrance monster ('@') at (row 13, col 25).

From the current position (row 13, col 1), the best action is to move to the right (towards col 2) since staying on the same row will avoid encountering any monsters directly above. This action does not lead me directly to the monsters or traps while also starting to move toward areas where treasures are present.

Executing the action now, I will proceed to move right:

``` Action:3 ``` 

This action is expected to keep moving in a safer direction, aligning with the strategy of avoiding monsters and collecting goodies.
